metadata.title: Kenchii Bumble Bee 44 Tooth Grooming Thinner
features: The Bumble Bee 44 tooth thinner will glide through thick coats with ease.
Each tooth is double serrated for moderate blending power and the level 3 alloy ensures a long lasting sharp edge.
With the sleek finish of the black titanium coating and the impressive, reliable performance this shear is sure to become a fast favorite!
description: Model: KEBB Bumble Bee - Thinner: 44 Teeth (Total Length 7.0") - Handle:Offset - Edge: Semi-convex - Material: Level 3 - Assembly: External - Recommended for: Everyday, Finishing
